summary: A solitary embalmer meets a charming and unemployed waiter who becomes his assistant, but the two get involved in a morbid and unhealthy professional and personal relationship.
cast: Ernesto Mahieux|Valerio Foglia Manzillo|Elisabetta Rocchetti|Lina Bernardi|Pietro Biondi|Marcella Granito|Giuseppe Arena|Bernardino Terracciano|Rosario J. Gnolo|Vincenzo Puocci|Renato Puocci|Valentino Puocci|Aldo Leonardi|Nadia Carlomagno|Rita Brugnoli|Livia Rasetti|Salvatore Felaco|Ferdinando Iannucci|Antonella Lori|Carlo Del Sorbo|Ana Elena Chantzis|Ciro Fortunato|Carmine Migliaccio|Antonella Paparano|Maria Puocci|Roberta Puocci|Sabrina Puocci|Valentina Puocci|Francesco Apolloni
title: L'imbalsamatore
